# bootLoader

**Instance Property**

The guest system to boot when the VM starts.

## Declaration

```swift
var bootLoader: VZBootLoader? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assign the boot loader object that contains information about how to load your guest operating system. For example, to configure your VM with a Linux operating system, assign a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZLinuxBootLoader] object.
